summary: Phase 2 testing completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (18/18 tests passed). Frontend features tested: Hero Section with bilingual content, language toggle (Sinhala/English), teacher dashboard with filters, and progress report with Recharts radar visualization. Critical issue: Paper 2 submission page not accessible from student dashboard - no navigation link/button exists despite route being defined.

integration_issues.issue: Student dashboard does not have a link/button to access Paper 2 submission page. Route /paper2/:examId exists but no UI navigation element.
integration_issues.impact: Students cannot upload Paper 2 answer sheets, blocking the entire Paper 2 workflow including teacher marking

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (35/39 features tested - Paper 2 submission access blocked)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Add Paper 2 submission navigation to StudentDashboard.js. Students need a button/link to access /paper2/:examId route. Suggested implementation: Add 'Submit Paper 2' button in exam card or as a separate action button. Without this, the entire Paper 2 workflow (student upload â†’ teacher marking) cannot be tested or used.
